passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
recoverPasswordInstructions: Enter the email associated with your account and you will receive instructions to recover your password
passwordLength1: *Your password must contain at least 8 digits
doNotUseUserNameOrPhone: *Do not use your name or phone
weRecommend: *We recommend using uppercase, lowercase, symbols and letters
addSchedulesInfo: Add the schedules corresponding to your establishment without joining schedules
infoScheduleDialog: How do I fill my schedules?
infoScheduleDialogField1:
Fill out each day of the week that your establishment will be open following these 3 steps:
1) Select the day
2) add opening time
3) add closing time
infoScheduleDialogField3: *It is possible to add times if the closing time exceeds midnight:
infoScheduleDialogField5: ***If your establishment opens more than once a day you can add the day again
infoScheduleDialogField7: **Add as many schedules as you need with the +Add more schedules button

youWillNotReceive: You will not receive any orders while this is closed
yesIWantCloseIt: Yes, I want to close it
thisIsTheQr: This is the QR that identifies your establishment, you can show it to customers to scan it with their bizne app and redeem their meals

changePasswordInfo: Enter your current account password to change it
myStaffInfo: Consulta, agrega y bloquea al personal de tu establecimiento

areYouSureBlock: ¿Estás seguro de que deseas bloquear a este miembro de tu personal?

trainingInfo: In this section you will get the necessary information to get the most out of Your Business Menu for your business.

menuOfDayInfo: You must include 1 or 2 menu options for the reservation in the image so that the customer can choose one
